Mary uses her income to help her husband to feed the family. Mary will use the loan to buy maize in larger quantities to produce more "kenkey". With the new profits from her business, Mary plans to produce more "kenkey".

loans.use: to buy maize in larger quantities to produce more "kenkey".

loans.name: Diana

texts.en: Diana sells sweet potatoes at Asebu Ekroful. She is single and has two children. Diana has been selling sweet potatoes for five years. She uses her income to feeds and clothe her children. Her loan will be used to purchase bags of sweet potatoes for sale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase bags of sweet potatoes for sale.

loans.name: Mavis

texts.en: Mavis is married and has five children. She completed J.H.S. Mavis sells phones at Asebu Ekroful, which she has done for three years. Her husband is a driver. Mavis uses her income to help her husband to pay their accommodation bills. Mavis will use the loan to buy more phones to sell. With the new profits from her business, Mavis plans to acquire a shop for the sale of her phones.

loans.use: to buy more phones to sell.

loans.name: Comfort

texts.en: Comfort  sells charcoal, oranges and sweet potatoes at Asebu Ekroful. She is married and has three children. Her husband is a mason. Comfort has been selling charcoal, oranges and sweet potatoes for three years. She assists her husband as to the welfare of the children. Her loan will be used to buy bags of charcoal, oranges and sweet potatoes for sale. With the new profit she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: buy bags of charcoal, oranges and sweet potatoes for sale.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is married and has four children. Grace operates a grocery shop at Asebu Ekroful, which she has done for four years. Her husband is a driver. Grace uses her income to help her husband to pay their children’s school fees. Grace will use the loan to purchase more groceries to give variety to her customers. With the new profits, Grace will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to offer variety to her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy products for stocking her store, such as drinks purchased at wholesale.

loans.name: Ekua

texts.en:
Ekua  is a widow and has eight dependents. Ekua sells charcoal at Asebu Ekroful, which she has done for four years. Ekua uses her income to cater for the children.

 Ekua will use the loan to  purchase firewood to produce  her charcoal for sale. With the new profits from her business, Ekua plans to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase firewood to produce charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is a married woman. She has three children with ages ranging from 3 to 11 years. She describes herself as honest and God-fearing. She operates a retail business where she sells containers, etc. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. Her business is located in a busy and  viable area and her primary customers are residents. 

Rose describes her biggest business challenge to be few customers. She will use the Kes 15,000 loan to  buy items such as basins, shoes, charcoal stoves, etc. Rose's business goal is to venture into the clothes business within five years.

loans.use: To buy more basins, shoes, charcoal stoves, etc.

loans.name: Eladia

texts.es: Doña Eadia, de 42 años de edad, habitante de comarca el Triunfo, se desempeña como docente de primaria desde hace 8 años,  solicita su 9no crédito a esta institución para invertirlo en mejora de su vivienda como es acondicionar su cuartito embaldozandolo y repellandolo, y de esta manera tener mejores condiciones en su hogar, ella cuenta con el apoyo de su marido el cual se desempeña como albañil ambos son unidos y comparten con los deberes del hogar y con los compromisos, en su comunidad es una persona con buenas referencias personales y también labores. Su sueño es gozar de salud, trabajo y que la familia sigan unidos.
texts.en:
Eadia is 42, and lives in the Triunfo region. She has been working as a primary teacher for eight years. 

She is applying to this institution for her ninth loan, to invest in home improvements that involve fixing up a small room, by tiling and plastering it. In this way she will have better living conditions in her home.

She has the support of her husband, who is a construction worker. They are a close couple, and share the household duties as well as their commitments. In her community, she is a person with good personal and work references. 

Her dream is to enjoy good health, and that her family stay close-knit.

loans.use: To fix up a room, by tiling and plastering.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fish and maize in bulk.

loans.name: Dora Luz

texts.es: Dora Luz es una persona que siempre se ha dedicado a brindarle el mayor bienestar a su familia, por esto trabaja fuertemente en la venta de mercancía por catálogo y la venta de empanadas y fritos, sin embargo, estas actividades no le permite generar buenos ingresos, pues su nivel de ventas es muy bajo debido a la poca clientela que tiene en el sector. Dora Luz desde hace un tiempo ha venido recibiendo sugerencias por parte de sus clientes de que monte un negocio de comidas rápidas, pues en el sector no existe un negocio así, y es muy apetecido por los habitantes. Dora Luz aspira a montar este negocio para que incrementen sus ingresos, y poder así mejorar la calidad de vida de su esposo y su hijo, sin embargo, no tiene el capital suficiente para iniciar el negocio. Es por esto que Dora Luz aspira a tener un préstamo que le permita comprar el carro de comidas rápidas y comprar los insumos necesarios para los primeros días, y así poder iniciar la actividad de la venta de comidas rápidas. Dora Luz aspira que con esta nueva actividad pueda generar mas ingresos que los que genera actualmente y poder así cumplir su sueño de que su hijo tenga la mejor educación posible y que en un futuro su hijo tenga una estabilidad económica y no tenga que sufrir tantos percances como sus padres.
texts.en:
Dora Luz is a person who has always devoted herself to providing greater well-being for her family. This is why she works hard selling merchandise by catalogue, and selling empanadas (stuffed pastries) and fried foods. However, these activities do not allow her to generate good income, as her level of sales is very low, due to the fact that she has few customers in her area.

For some time, Dora Luz has been getting suggestions from her customers that she set up a fast-food business, as in this part of the city, there isn't a business like this, and it is much desired by people in the area. 

Dora Luz plans to set up this business, so she can increase her income, and in this way improve the quality of life of her husband and son. However, she doesn't have sufficient capital to start the business. 

This is why Dora Luz is hoping to take out a loan, to allow her to buy a fast-food cart and the necessary ingredients for the first days. This will enable her to start selling fast-food. 

Dora Luz hopes that with this new livelihood, she can generate more income than she does currently, so that she can fulfill her dream of her son having the best possible education, and financial stability in the future, so that he doesn't have to suffer as many setbacks as his parents did.

loans.use: To buy a fast-food cart, and ingredients for the first days of operation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more of her goods for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to produce more charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es: La señora   Lidia es cliente  nueva será  la primera secuencia de su crédito, la señora Lidia es casada vive en la ciudad de La Paz tiene  dos hijos, la cliente se dedica  a la confección  de chamarras y  también tiene un segundo  negocio  de salón de billar en la misma casa, el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de telas por  rollo, la cliente trabaja sacrificadamente en su negocio, una ves terminado sus productos los lleva  a la localidad de Desaguadero  que es frontera con Bolivia y Perú,   también  entrega  en  los distintos mercados de la  ciudad de La Paz, donde ya tiene muchos pedidos por la buena calidad en sus prendas de vestir, el dinero del credito lo utilizara en la compra de tela por rollo para confeccionar chamarras,  La Sra. Lidia se encuentra muy agradecida por la oportunidad que le brindan en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en: Lidia is a new client and this will be the first step in her loan. Lidia is married with two children and lives in the city of La Paz. She makes jackets and also has a second business in the same house which is a billiards room. She will invest the loan in buying fabric by the roll. The client works hard, sacrificing herself for her business. Once the products are finished she brings them to an outlet on the border of Bolivia and Peru. She also delivers them to different markets in the city of La Paz, where she already has a lot of orders because of the good quality of her garments. She will use the money from the loan to buy rolls of fabric to make jackets. Lidia is very grateful for the opportunity they are giving her by granting this loan.

loans.use: to invest in buying rolls of fabric.

loans.name: Marcy

texts.en: Marcy sells cooked rice at Asebu Ekroful. She is married and has 5 children. Her husband is a farmer. Mercy has been selling cooked rice for 10 years now. She supports her husband in their daily activities. Her loan will be used to buy bags of rice to cook and sell. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to manage a stall from which to sell the rice.

loans.use: to buy bags of rice to cook and sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cosmetics and sweet potatoes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to open a shop for her dress making.

loans.name: Aba

texts.en: Aba  is married with one child. She cooks   rice for sale at Asebu Ekroful, which she has done for three years. Her husband is a farmer. Aba uses her income to help her   husband in the general upkeep of the family. Aba will use the loan to buy bags of rice  to  cook  for sale. With the new profits from her business, Aba plans to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy bags of rice  to  cook  for sale.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es: El señor Wilfredo se dedica a la construcción es albañil contratista  tiene bastante experiencia en esta actividad por cual es conocido y contratado para realizar obras ya que realiza un buen trabajo; el señor Wilfredo vive con sus hijas en casa de familiar  en la zona Loreto, indica que el es la única persona que sustenta su familia con sus ingresos gracias  a ello sus hijas se encuentran estudiando a nivel universitario lo cual lo hace sentir orgulloso de ver que sus esfuerzos están dando frutos, con el dinero del crédito comprar herramientas que le hacen falta ya que las que tiene ya cumplieron su vida útil,  actualmente el señor Wilfredo necesita el crédito para comprar herramientas y mejorar sus equipos de trabajo.
texts.en: Wilfredo works in construction as an experienced contractor. He has a good reputation for doing quality work. Wilfredo lives with his daughters in the Loreto zone. Thanks to his business, which is the family's only source of income, Wilfredo is able to pay for his daughters' university fees and he is very proud to see the fruits of his labor. With this loan, Wilfredo will buy tools to replace ones that have worn out. This will allow him to improve the equipment he uses in his work.

loans.use: To buy tools for his business.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en:
Efua is married and has four children. She produces "gari" (cassava grits) and "kenkey" (fermented corn dough) at Asebu Ekroful, which she has done for four years. Her husband is a farmer. Efua uses her income to assist her husband in paying their children’s school fees. 

Efua will use the loan to purchase cassava and  maize for the production of  her "gari" and "kenkey" for sale. With the new profits, Efua plans to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase cassava and  maize to for the production of  her "gari" and "kenkey".

loans.name: Dorice

texts.en: Dorice is a married woman. She has three children with ages ranging from 3 years to 10 years. She describes herself as an  innovative and God-fearing woman. She operates a retail business where she sells clothes. She has been involved in this business for three years. Her business is located at a busy and  viable area and her primary customers are residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be the high cost of clothes. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more  clothes to sell. Her business goal is to run a boutique within five years.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Adowa

texts.en:
Adowa  is single and has three children. She has completed J.H.S. 

Adowa sells "kenkey" (fermented maize dough) at Asebu Ekroful, which she has done for two years. She uses her income to feed, clothe and shelter her children. Adowa will use the loan she receives to purchase maize for her "kenkey". With the new profits, Adowa plans to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase maize for her "kenkey".

loans.name: Adowa

texts.en:
Adowa  is married and has a child.  She  produces locally-made soap called "alata semina" for sale and she also sells sweet potatoes at Asebu Ekroful, which she has done for four years. Her husband is a pensioner.  

Adowa uses her income to help her husband in supporting the family. She will use the loan to produce  more soap  and to buy sweet potatoes for sale. With the new profits, Adowa plans to expand her business.

loans.use: to produce  more soap  and to buy sweet potatoes for sale.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua is married and has 4 children. She is a fish monger at Asebu Ekroful. She has been operating this business for 4 years. Her husband is a trader. Efua will use the loan to buy more fish to sell. With the new profits, efua plans to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Winfred

texts.en: Winfred is a married woman. She has 2 children, ages ranging from 5 years to 10 years. She describes herself to be honest and a God-fearing person. She operates a beauty salon where she provides services of plaiting, blowdrying and selling braids. She has been involved in this business for 2 years. Her business is located at a busy and viable area and her primary customers are nearby residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be customers' tardiness. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy a hair dryer and beauty products. Her business goal is to run a bigger salon within 5 years.

loans.use: to buy a hair dryer and beauty products.

loans.name: Mujeres En Marcha Group

texts.es:
el grupo Mujeres en Marcha esta integrado por 3 mujeres, que tienen muchos deseos de salir adelante, Doña Rosa es la cordinadora del grupo, ella tiene 42 años de edad, esta casada y es madre de 2 hijos, Rosa se dedica a la preparacion de alimentos, su actividad principal es la elaboración de nacatamales y Hamburguesas; negocio que opera en su casa de habitación, todos los dias se levanta muy temprano para empezar la produccion y luego salir a vender los nacatamales y las hamburguesas, el credito lo utilizara para la compra de los materiales para la preparacion de sus comidas. muchos clientes la prefieren ya que sus alimentos son higienicos y de muy buen sabor. 
estas tres mujeres se conocen muy bien y son muy responsables, conforman el grupo con la Sra. Blanca Lidia de 54 años de edad y con la Sra. Maryuri Maribel de 28 años de edad.
las ganancias las necesitan para salir adelante con sus familias.
texts.en:
The Mujeres en Marcha group has three members who are very motivated to succeed in their business goals. Rosa is the group's coordinator; she is 42 years old, married, and has two children. She owns a food preparation business, specializing in nacatamales (a steamed meat and vegetable pasty, cooked in banana or maize leaves) and hamburgers. Part of this loan will be used to buy ingredients for her food products. Rosa has many customers because she is very careful about the cleanliness of her ingredients and preparation, and because her food is delicious.

All three women know each other very well and are very responsible. The other members are named Blanca Lidia, age 54, and Maryuri Maribel, age 28. The income these women earn from their businesses are used to improve their families' quality of life.

loans.use: To buy bread, ground pork, lettuce, tomatoes, ketchup, mayonnaise, mustard, oil, corn flour, poultry, pork, vegetables, olives, raisins, rice, and condiments.

loans.name: Israel

texts.es: Israel, de 27 años, es un joven muy alegre y luchador, vive en su propia casa  junto a su esposa Eugenia de 22 años y sus 02 queridos hijos, Alexander de 04 y Josue de 03 años de edad, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Israel, es un hombre de provecho, se dedica con mucho esmero a labrar la tierra  para luego cultivar plantas de café, cacao y hojas de cosa, actividad que realiza hace más de  10 años. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de jornaleros; de esa manera extrae rápido los frutos para luego ser  comercializados a las empresas acopiadoras, quienes le remuneran buena ganancias por cada kilogramo de cacao, café y hojas de coca que vende. Sin embargo le resulta difícil transportar sus frutos desde la chacra hasta los centros de acopio, situado en la ciudad de San Francisco. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es comprar nuevas tierras para ampliar la siembra y de esa manera aumentar su producción y por ende obtener una buena estabilidad económica.  Este será su  crédito número 02 con MFP, está dispuesto a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que desea acceder a otro crédito más adelante. En su banco comunal es un socio muy participe. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, contratará jornaleros para que lo apoyen en sacar la maleza que aqueja sus plantas.
texts.en:
Israel, 27, is a very good-natured and determined young man. He lives in his own home along with his wife Eugenia, 22, and their two dear children, Alexander, 4, and Josue, 3, to whom he wishes to provide a better quality of life. Israel is a productive citizen and devotes himself wholeheartedly to working the earth in order to plant coffee, cocoa and coca leaf plants, something he has been doing for more than ten years. During harvest times he relies on the support of day laborers so as to rapidly extract the beans and leaves for sale to the warehousing companies who remunerate him well for each kilogram of cocoa, coffee and coca leaves he sells. However, it is difficult for him to transport his products from the farm to the warehouses, located in the city of San Francisco [Peru]. But for now his biggest priority is to buy new land in order to increase his acreage for planting and thus increase production and achieve good financial stability. 

This will be his second loan with MFP. He is willing to make all his payments on time, since he wishes to have access to another loan further on. In his communal bank he is a highly participative member. With the 2,000 Peruvian soles he will hire day laborers to assist him in removing the weeds afflicting his plants.

loans.use: to hire day laborers.

loans.name: Emprendedores 5 Estrellas Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendimiento Emprendedores 5 Estrellas, se encuentra en su primer ciclo las integrantes de este banco viven en la zona de Pampahasi. La presidenta es la señora Candelaria ella se dedica a vender papa por cargas,  el crédito lo solicito para aumentar mas capital en las fiestas de año nuevo ella tiene 2 hijas que se encuentra en edad escolar,  el esposo es chofer y la ayuda con el negocio, transportando las cargas de papa de la Sra. Candelaria, de esta manera ayudando a su esposa, la Sra. candelaria con el dinero del crédito comprara papa por cantidad, le va muy bien con esta actividad ya que esta es su única actividad para mantener a su familia, la Sra. Candelaria es una persona trabajadora se siente feliz y agradecida por la oportunidad que le brindan en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en: This is the first loan cycle for "Emprendedores 5 Estrellas" communal bank. The members of the communal bank live in the Pampahasi region. The group's president is Candelaria, who sells potatoes by the load. She is requesting the loan to increase her capital for the New Year's celebrations. She has 2 school-aged daughters. Her husband is a driver and helps her with the business, transporting the loads of potatoes for Candelaria to help out his wife. With the money from the loan, she will purchase potatoes in bulk. She's getting along very well with this business, since this is her only work activity for maintaining her family. Candelaria is a hard-working person, and she is happy and grateful for the opportunity afforded her through the granting of the loan.

loans.use: to purchase potatoes in bulk

loans.name: Señor De Huanca Milagroso Group

texts.es:
La socia Elizabeth pertenece al banco comunal "SEÑOR DE HUANCA MILAGROSO"; El banco se encuentra ubicado enel distrito de Huanchac, perteneciente al departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 22 años de edad y es casada, la socia tiene 2 hijos; la socia es abogada de profesión y actualmnete trabaja en el poder judicial, ella paralelamente a este trabjao se dedica  ala venta de ropa para damas en especial; la socia viaja cada 2 meses y trae ropa para damas y las reparte a sus diferentes amigas y amistades, La socia en esta ocasión solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de ropa.
Los otros socios  trabajan en diferentes negocios como atencion de la tienda de abarrotes, venta de productos de belleza por catalogos, venta de comidas, secretarias, venta de ropa entre otros.


La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido.
texts.en:
The member Gloria belongs to the communal bank "Mamacha Asunta de Calca," located in the province of Calca belonging to the department of Cusco, one hour from the city of Cusco. 

The member is 22 years old and is married with 2 children. She is a lawyer and works in the judiciary. She also sells special women's clothes. She travels every 2 months and brings clothing for women and then distributes them among her different friends and acquaintances. She is asking for the loan to invest in the purchase of clothing. The other members work in various other occupations, such as small grocery stores, beauty products via catalog, food sales, secretaries, and clothing sales. 
The member appreciates the loan and commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for resale

loans.name: Maria Ilduara

texts.es: Maria Ilduara ha sido una persona muy trabajadora durante toda su vida. Desde hace 25 años montó su propio taller de confección y se ha desempeñado en esta actividad desde entonces. La actividad la aprendió por unos cursos que tomó y gracias a estos buenos cursos sus trabajos tienen la reputación de ser de muy buena calidad. Debido a problemas de su salud, Maria Ilduara presenta algunos inconvenientes a la hora de confeccionar sus productos, sin embargo, espera estos problemas sean superados una vez pueda contratar a una persona para que le ayude a la confección de sus prendas. Gracias a que su negocio esta creciendo, Maria Ilduara necesita comprar insumos que le permitan atender los pedidos que le hacen sus clientes, sin embargo, en el momento no dispone del capital necesario para la compra de los insumos que requiere; es por esto que Maria Ilduara aspira a que con un préstamo le sea posible comprar los insumos necesarios y pueda así seguir expandiendo las ventas de su negocio. Maria Ilduara afirma que con el incremento en las ventas que ha tenido en los últimos días, podrá cumplir su sueño de que su taller se expanda y pueda contratar a personas de bajos recursos económicos y les brinde la posibilidad de trabajar por un buen ingreso.
texts.en:
María Ilduara has been a very hardworking person her entire life.  She set up her own sewing workshop 25 years ago and has been working in that activity ever since.  She learned her craft taking courses and thanks to these good courses her work has the reputation of being very high quality.  Due to some health problems, María Ilduara faces some inconveniences when she’s making her items.  However, she hopes these difficulties will be overcome once she can hire a person to help her make her articles of clothing.

Thanks to her business growing, María Ilduara needs to buy more supplies so that she can fill customer orders.  However, at present she does not have the necessary capital to buy the supplies she needs.  Because of this, María Ilduara hopes that with the loan it will be possible to buy the necessary supplies to continue expanding sales in her business.  María Ilduara affirms that with the increase in sales she’s had the last few days she’ll be able to reach her dream of expanding her workshop and hiring people of low economic resources providing them with job opportunities that earn good income.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Leoncio

texts.es: Leoncio, de 37 años, convive con Reyna de 33 años, padres de 04 hijos, quienes son la felicidad de su hogar y viven en su propia casa en la comunidad Manitea Alta. Leoncio, es un hombre de provecho, Es campesino y se dedica con mucho esmero a labrar la tierra para cultivar café, cacao y hojas de coca, actividad que lo realiza desde hace 18 años y es conocedor del arduo trabajo en el agro. En tiempos de cosecha busca el apoyo de los jornaleros para que lo  apoyen en la extracción de los frutos. Sus frutos que mayor retabilidad le dan, son los granos de cacao y las hojas de coca, por lo que las empresas acopiadoras le remuneran muy bien por cada kilogramo. El problema de su trabajo radica en no poder combatir con los insectos quienes se encargan de dañar los frutos de las plantas. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es comprar nuevas tierras para ampliar la siembra y aumentar su producción. Este será su crédito número 03 con MFP, está dispuesto a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que desea acceder a otro crédito más adelante. En su banco comunal es un socio muy participe. Con los 2,500 nuevos soles, comprará más plantas de café  para luego injertarlos y sacar buen provecho de sus frutos en menor tiempo.
texts.en: Leoncio is 37 and lives with Reyna, who is 33.  They have 4 children, who are their happiness.  They live in their own home in Manitea Alta.  Leoncio is a hard-working farmer who works with great effort to grow coffee, cacao and coca leaves, which he has done for the past 18 years through his own effort.  At harvest time he counts on the help of day laborers to bring the fruit crop in.  The crops which he gains most profit from are cacao and coca, as companies buy at good prices for each kilogram of produce.  A problem he faces is not being able to control insect pests that attack his fruit crop.  But his first priority is to buy more land to increase his production.  This is his 3rd loal from MFP, and he is ready to repay promptly, so as to be able to continue to have access to credit in the future.  He participates actively as a member of his communal lender. With 2,500 nuevos soles, he will buy coffee plants, to later graft them in order to produce fruit in a shorter time span.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants

loans.name: Leopoldo

texts.es: Leopoldo tiene 34 años; es un hombre trabajador, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Martha de 28 años y sus 03 queridos hijos, a quienes promete brindarles una buena educación. Leopoldo, es un hombre muy laborioso, con su puesto de trabajo trata de sobresalir adelante. Él es comerciante y tiene una tienda de abarrotes, cuyo no,bre tiene "la Bodega de Leopoldo", negocio que es muy concurrido por sus compradores. Es así que desde muy temprano las puerta de su tienda están abiertas y listas para recibir a sus primeros compradores, quiens saben de la variedad de mercadería que vende. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes ya que es una de sus habilidades que emplea para ganar mayor cantidad de consumidores. Lleva 22 años en este negocio y considera que lo más difícil es permanecer de pie casi todo el transcurso del día. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP, siente que este dinero le ayudará mucho con el progreso de su trabajo y está dispuesto a cumplir puntualmente con sus cronogramas de pagos. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles, comprará lo necesario para implementar de productos su tienda.
texts.en: Leopoldo is 34 and very hard-working.  He lives in his own home with his wife Martha, who is 28 and their 3 children, for whom he intends to provide a good education. Leopoldo works hard to get ahead as a vendor, and has a store of basic goods called "la Bodega de Leopoldo", with an active clientele.  He opens his shop early to receive his clients, who come for the variety of products he offers.  He enjoys talking with his customers and it is a factor that helps him gain new clients.  He has worked in this business for 22 years and finds it difficult to stand up for so long each day.  This is his first loan with MFP, and feels that this credit will help him advance in business.  He is committed to prompt repayment and plans to use the1,500 nuevos soles to buy new product stock for his store.

loans.use: to buy product stock for his store

loans.name: Olga Ines

texts.es: Olga Inés se ha caracterizado por ser una persona muy trabajadora y dedicada a sus tres hijos y su esposo. Desde hace algún tiempo se viene desempeñando en la actividad de venta de comidas y gracias a esto ha podido generar los ingresos necesarios para sostener los gastos de su hogar. Olga Inés no tuvo unos padres con una buena capacidad económica, por lo que tuvo que afrontar grandes adversidades en la vida, y no quiere que sus 3 hijos tengan que pasar por las mismas circunstancias. Es por esto que Olga Inés siempre trabaja con más esmero por sacar adelante a sus 3 hijos y brindarles la mejor educación posible. Gracias a que sus comidas tienen una muy buena reputación entre sus clientes, Olga Inés ha visto como su negocio ha venido incrementando sus ventas, por lo que requiere de la compra de más insumos para preparar más alimentos que les venda a sus clientes; sin embargo, Olga Inés no dispone en el momento del capital necesario para la compra de insumos que requiere, por lo que aspira a que un préstamo le permita acceder a la compra de dichos insumos y su negocio siga incrementando sus ventas. Olga Inés aspira a que su negocio siga con la misma senda de crecimiento y que sus ingresos también se incrementen considerablemente, de modo que pueda mejorar su calidad de vida, la de su esposo y la de sus 3 hijos, a los que quiere brindarles la mejor educación posible.
texts.en: Olga Inés has been characterized as a person who is very hardworking and dedicated to her 3 children and her husband.  For some time now, she has been working selling food, and thanks to this activity she has been able to generate the income she needs to support the household expenses.  Olga Inés had parents with limited resources, and so she had to face a lot of adversity in her life.  She doesn't want her children to have the same experience.  For this reason, Olga Inés has always worked hard to provide for her children and give them the best education she can. She has a good reputation with her customers, thanks to the good food that she sells.  Olga Inés has seen her sales increase, and so she needs to buy more supplies to make the food that she sells to her customers.  However, Olga Inés does not have the capital available at this time to buy the supplies that she needs.  For this reason, she has applied for a loan that will allow her to purchase these supplies so that she can continue to increase her sales.  Olga Inés wants her business to continue on this growth path so that her income can increase considerably, and so that she can improve the quality of her life and that of her husband and their 3 children, as she wants to provide her child with the best possible education.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make the food that she sells to her customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new machinery to make cement blocks because the current one does not work very well.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita, de 24 años, es una mujer trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Sabino de 35 años y su querido hijo Luis de 08 años, a quien desea brindar un mejor porvenir. Margarita y su pareja son el sostén de sus hijos. Margarita desde muy niña trabajó en las tierras de sus padres y hoy es toda una conocedora de la labor que se realiza en el campo, es campesina y siembra café. Tiene más de 10 años trabajando en sus propias tierras, y en tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de los jornaleros, para  así avanzar con mayor rapidez la extracción de los frutos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar los frutos; ya que así siente que los meses de arduo trabajo le brindan como recompensa la calidad de sus frutos. Considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde la chacra hasta los centros de acopio ubicados en la ciudad de san francisco; lugar donde le ofrecen mejores precios por sus productos. Su dificultad es no poder contar con suficiente ingreso económico para solventar los pagos por adelantado a los jornaleros, es por ello que acude a los préstamos que facilita la institución MFP. Por tanto, este será su crédito numero 01 y sabe que con éste aporte le ayudará mucho en el progreso de su trabajo. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, contratará jornaleros para que le brinden el apoyo en las cosechas y sacar la maleza.
texts.en: Margarita, age 24, is a hardworking woman who lives in her own home with her husband, Sabino, age 35, and her beloved 8-year-old son, Luis, to whom she hopes to give a better future. Margarita and her husband support their son. Margarita started to work on her parents' crop fields at a very young age, and now, she is an expert in cultivation. She is a farm worker who grows coffee plants. She has been working for over 10 years on her own fields, and during the harvest, she has the support of day laborers so that they can pick the crops at a much faster rate. What she likes most about her job is harvesting because she feels compensated for all those months of arduous labor with high-quality produce. She considers the most difficult aspect of her job to be transporting the produce from her farm to the stockpile centers located in the city of San Francisco, where they offer the best prices for her produce. Her difficulty is not having enough income to pay the day laborers in advance, which is why she turns to MFP for a loan. This will be her first loan, and she knows that it will help her a lot with her work. With the 1,000.00 PEN, she will hire day laborers who will help her with the weeding and harvesting.

loans.use: to hire day laborers.

loans.name: Lorena Elizabeth

texts.es:
Doña Lorena tiene 40 años de edad, vive en unión libre y se dedica a la preparacion de comidas y golosinas, su negocio opera en su casa de habitación, temprano todos los dias elabora sus comidas, Lorena no cuenta con el capital necesario para comprar alimentos para preparar sus comidas y es por esta razón que está solicitando el crédito, compra de productos para la elaboración de las golosinas y así satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes.
las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Ms. Lorena is 40 years old and has a live-in partner. She prepares and sells food and sweets from home for a living. She prepares her dishes very early every morning. However, Lorena does not have the capital necessary to purchase the ingredients to prepare her dishes, which is why she is requesting this loan to buy what she needs to make sweets and meals, thus meeting customer demand.

She needs the profits in order to help her family get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase tortillas, pork, beef, chicken, vegetables, cooking oil, rice, beans, lard, condiments, beverages, bread, propane, and water.

loans.name: Esther

texts.es: La socia Esther continua con su negocio, ella sigue adminitrando y atendiendo su tienda de abarrotes y tambien sigue vendiendo cosméticos. En esta oportunidad la socia necesita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos, harinas, leche, aceite y otros productos de primera necesidad.
texts.en: Esther still runs her general store and she also continues to sell cosmetics. At this time, our member needs the loan to purchase products like rice, sugar, noodles, flour, milk, cooking oil, and other basic need items.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, noodles, flour, milk, cooking oil, and other basic need items.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase lingerie and beauty products to sell.

loans.name: Santos Amalia

texts.es:
Doña Santos Amalia tiene 40 años de edad,  vive en unión libre y es madre de 1 hijo. 
Santos Amalia se dedica al comercio,  su actividad principal es la venta de abarrotería (Pulpería) negocio que opera en su casa de habitación, tiene mucha experiencia en el manejo de su negocio.
la Sra. Santos Amalia utilizara el prestamo para comprar productos de la canasta básica, como ser: arroz, azúcar, pastas, refrescos, cloro, café, sardinas, manteca, aceite, frijoles, tortillas, papel higienico, margarina, carne de cerdo, res y pollo etc. para ofrecerles mas variedad a sus clientes.
con las ganancias que obtiene del negocio logra cubrir los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Ms. Santos Amalia is 40 years old and has a live-in partner and one son. Santos Amalia is an entrepreneur whose main business is selling general goods, which she does from her home. She has a lot of experience managing this business.

Ms. Santos Amalia will use this loan to purchase basic need items like rice, sugar, pasta, beverages, bleach, coffee, sardines, lard, cooking oil, beans, tortillas, bathroom tissue, margarine, pork, beef, chicken, and other goods to offer a greater variety of products to her customers.

With the profits she will earn from the business, she will be able to pay the household expenses.

loans.use: to purchase staple grains, meats, dairy products, and other provisions.

loans.name: Virgilio

texts.es:
Don Virgilio continua laborando en el area de conductor, como objetivo estos años, ha sido la construccion de su vivienda, lo que junto a su esposa se esfuerzan para lograr las mejora, ella trabaja cuidando niños, lo que equilibra los gastos de alimentacion  y poder cubrir los pagos.
Sus hijos solo dos estan con ellos, los cuales estudian, hoy con este nuevo prestamo cambiara techo de los cuartos, y si ajusta comprara puerta y ventana, lo que lograra mejor seguridad y estabilidad familiar.
texts.en:
Mr. Virgilio continues to work as a bus driver, but his goal these last few years has been to build his house. He and his wife work hard in order to be able to make home improvements. She works in childcare, which helps with the cost of food and helps pay the bills.

Their children, who live with them, are currently in school. With this new loan, he will change the roof of the rooms, and if he has enough money left over, he will buy a door and window to increase safety and family stability.

loans.use: to change the roof of the rooms in his house and purchase a door and window, thus making his home safer.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 36 años, es una mujer muy humilde y trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Lorenzo de 38 años, ambos se dedican en los cuidados de su tierras y les va muy bien. María se levanta muy temprano para dirigirse tranquilamente a la chacra con su amado esposo. Pues cultiva plantas de café, productos importantes que le sirven de sustento para sobre salir y cubrir el gasto de educación. En tiempos de cosecha y deshierbo de malezas necesariamente contrata jornaleros para poder avanzar con mayor celeridad en cuanto a su faena programada. Gracias a las sugerencias de las socias de su banco, ella optó en acercarse a MFP para solicitar su crédito ya que ella tiene referencias que nuestra institución presta créditos a las personas más necesitadas con fines a invertir el dinero en algo útil. Con el apoyo de los financistas llevará acabo sus actividades programadas, por ello requiere el dinero para comprar sacos de abono para mejorar sus tierras  y volverlas muy fructíferas. Posteriormente piensa comprar más espacios de terreno para seguir cultivando. Este será el crédito número 17 con MFP, por ello espera de la colaboración para poder comprar los productos sugeridos, a la vez se compromete a pagar puntualmente sus cronogramas de pago ya que desea acceder a otros préstamos posteriormente. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará sacos de abono ya que le servirán para mejorar sus plantas.
texts.en: Maria, age 36, is a very humble and hardworking woman. She lives in her own home with her husband, Lorenzo, age 38. They both work on their crop fields, and they are very prosperous. Maria gets up very early in the morning to calmly get to her small farm with her beloved husband. They cultivate coffee plants, an important crop that serves both as a means of a support and a way to cover educational expenses. During the harvest and weeding periods, it is necessary for her to hire day laborers so that they can get their farm work done in a speedy manner. Thanks to the suggestion of several group members, she opted to turn to MFP in order to request a loan, knowing that our microfinance institute lends money to the most needy people in order to help them invest in something useful. With your support, she will be able to carry out her planned tasks, which is why she needs the loan to purchase sacks of fertilizer to improve her fields and make them very fruitful. Later, she hopes to purchase more plots of land in order to expand her cultivation. This will be her 17th loan with MFP, which is why she hopes to get collaboration so that she can purchase the aforementioned products. At the same time, she commits to making her repayments in a punctual manner since she would like to obtain more loans in the future. With the 2,000.00 PEN, she will purchase sacks of fertilizer because they will improve her crops.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase materials like nylon thread, beads, thread in assorted colors, wood, paint, and other supplies so that she can increase her production of handicrafts.

loans.name: Nora Elena

texts.es:
Emprendedora es la mejor manera como se puede calificar y reconocer a Nora Elena. La esposa de un hermano le enseñó a elaborar dulces de chocolate y Nora Elena vio una gran oportunidad de negocio, por lo que empezó a elaborar los chocolates y a buscar venderlo por las tiendas de su sector. Al principio Nora Elena tuvo que superar grandes adversidades como la de conseguir un proveedor de calidad y de buenos precios, pero a Nora Elena no la aplacó nada y consiguió un excelente proveedor con excelentes precios. Ahora, Nora Elena comercializa sus productos por las tiendas de su sector y a algunos particulares les vende unas cantidades pequeñas, a tal punto que a Nora Elena le hacen más pedidos de los que puede producir. Es por esto que Nora Elena comprará más moldes y más materia prima para la producción de sus chocolates, sin embargo, actualmente no tiene el capital disponible para ello puesto que sus clientes le pagan a crédito, por lo que Nora Elena aspira a que con un préstamo pueda adquirir los moldes y la materia prima que necesita y su negocio siga creciendo para que genere mas ingresos. 

Nora Elena tiene un gran sueño y es el de tener una gran fábrica de dulces, y que su hijo de 10 años pueda heredar todo lo que ella con tanto esfuerzo ha buscado. Además, Nora Elena aspira a generar empleo muy pronto, y contratar a personas de bajos recursos que requieran de unos ingresos, así le mejorará la calidad de vida tanto a su hijo como a las demás personas que lo necesiten.
texts.en:
The best way to describe Nora Elena is "entrepreneur." Her sister-in-law taught her to make chocolate candies and Nora Elena saw a great business opportunity, so she began to make chocolates and found stores in her area where she could sell them. 

In the beginning, Nora Elena had to overcome great adversities, such as finding a supplier with quality goods and good prices, but Nora Elena refused to give up, and found an excellent supplier with excellent prices. Now Nora Elena markets her products in the local stores and sells a few to individuals, to the point where Nora Elena has more orders than she can fill. This is why Nora Elena wants to purchase more molds and raw materials for producing her chocolates, however right now she doesn't have the necessary capital for this since her customers pay her on credit. 

With this loan, Nora Elena's goal is to acquire the molds and raw materials she needs, and to continue the growth of her business in order to generate more income. Nora Elena's grand dream is to have a large chocolate factory, and for her 10 year old son to be able to inherit everything she has built through so much effort. In addition, Nora Elena hopes very soon to create jobs, and to hire people of little means who need some income. In this way she will improve her son's quality of life, as well as that of other people who need it.

loans.use: to purchase molds and raw materials for making chocolates

loans.name: Marddy Elieth

texts.es:
Doña Marddy de profesion estilista,  poco realiza sus trabajos, ya que ahora labora en ventas en un cafetin en donde venden variedad de alimentos y golosinas, ubicados en una cotran.
Desde hace años es madre soltera, de una hija el cual cursa la secundaria, tambien tiene el ingreso del alquiler de cuartos, el cual se ayuda en su economia. Con este nuevo financiamiento, podra remodelar un cuarto en el cambio de techo, y en la parte de atrás pondra paredes de concreto, puertas, teniendo mejor seguridad y mejor vivienda.
texts.en:
Doña Marddy is a stylist by profession, but does other jobs.  She now works in sales at a small cafe,located in a station, where they sell a variety of foods and sweets.

For years, she has been a single mother to a daughter who is in high school.  Marddy also has income from renting rooms, which helps her financial situation.  With this new loan, she will be able to remodel a room by changing the roof, and in the back she will put in concrete walls and doors.  This will provide better security and housing.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to remodel a room to provide better security.

loans.name: Ernestina

texts.es: La socia Ernestina continua con su pequeño taller de elaboración de artesanía en su casa. La socia desea seguir trabajando unos buenos años mas a eso mismo ritmo para poder terminar de construir la base para mejorar la economia de la familia la socia desea en esta ocasión obtener el credito para invertir en la compra de materiales como son arcillas, oxidos naturales, pinceles, entre otros para implemntar su taller.
texts.en: The member Ernestina continues with her small craft-making workshop in her home. She wishes to continue working a few more good years at the same pace to be able to finish building the foundation to improve the economy of the family. She wishes, on this occasion, to obtain a loan to buy supplies such as clays, natural oxides, brushes, among other things to run her workshop.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as clays, natural oxides, brushes, among other things to run her workshop.implemntar su taller.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María tiene 27 años, es una mujer trabajadora, vive en un su propia casa junto a su esposo José de 28 años y sus 03 queridos hijos, quienes son el motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. Los productos que con tanto voluntad y entrega ha logrado cultivar María le han ayudado mucho en el progreso de su vida. Todas las mañanas empieza a trabajar en sus tierras, ya que sabe que del cuidado que le brinde a sus cafetales, dependerá para obtener una buena producción. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos y se siente muy feliz cuando los ve grandes y frondosos. Lleva 15 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil, es llevar lo cosechado hasta la ciudad de San Francisco, lugar donde recibe mejores precios por sus productos. Mas adelante, espera sembrar más plantas de cacao ya que cuenta con terrenos sin cultivar. Este será su crédito número 02 con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente y está dispuesta a hacerlo. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, contratará jornaleros para que lo apoyen a sacar la maleza y se encargue de la cosecha de sus productos.
texts.en:
Maria is 27 years old and a hard worker.  She lives in her own house with her husband, Jose, who is 28 years old, and with their three dear children who are the motivating factor behind all her efforts.  The products that Maria has managed to cultivate through her will and commitment have helped her a lot in improving her life.

Every morning, she begins working on her land, as she knows that the care she provides to her coffee plants will help her obtain a good harvest.  What she likes most about her job is to take care of her crops, and she feels very happy when she sees them large and leafy.  She has been doing this work for 15 years and thinks that the most difficult part of the job is to take her harvest to the city of San Francisco, where she receives better prices for her products.  In the future, she hopes to plant more cacao as she currently has uncultivated land.  

This will be Mari's second loan with MFP.  She knows that she must make all of her payments punctually and is ready to do so.  With the 2000 nuevos soles (the Peruvian currency), she will hire workers who can help her with the weeding and who will take care of the harvest of her products.

loans.use: to hire workers.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
Celia es socia del Banco Comunal Marcela, es socia de Finca hace 2 años.
En todo el tiempo que ha estado en Finca Perú pudo aprender mucho, ella se esfuerza cada dia para ser mejor y salir adelante con sus hijas, las capacitaciones le ayudaron a poder comprender que siempre tiene que esforzarse para poder cumplir sus metas, Finca le ayudó y pudo comprarse un carro. El préstamo que ahora solicita lo invertirá en la cancelación de su carro y se irá a la ciudad de Lima para comprar ropa y llevarla a la selva.
texts.en: Celia’s a member of the “Marcela” communal bank and has been a member of Finca for two years.  In all the time she’s been in Finca she’s been able to learn much.   The training helped her to understand that she must always strive to reach her goals.  Finca helped her to buy a car.  The loan she’s requesting now is to pay off her car and to go to the city of Lima to buy clothes to then take to the jungle to sell.

loans.use: to pay off her car loan and to buy clothes to resell.

loans.name: Maria Andrea

texts.es:
Doña Maria continua trabajando como conserje, dando el apoyo a sus hijos es los estudios, ya que no cuenta con el apoyo economico de su ex esposo, para ella, no es facil ya que todo esta altos costos, pero sigue trabajando para poder cubrir sus necesidades.
Es atraves del financiamiento que hara mejoras a su casa, comenzando un cuarto, el cual solo tiene el aranque y desea levantar de concreto, en la parte de alado de su terreno. Para esto comprara materiales de construccion y comenzar la obra.
texts.en:
María continues working as a caretaker supporting her children’s schooling since she gets no support from her ex-husband.  For her, it’s not easy because everything is so expensive but she continues working to be able to cover her needs.

Through the loan she’ll do some home improvement starting with a room which currently has only started; she wants to erect concrete on the side of her lot and to do so will buy building materials and supplies and start the project.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es: Antonia es socia del Banco Comunal Marcela, tiene 56 años, es feriante de ropa y mochilas, es madre de 3 hijos, es casada, agradece a Finca porque en los momentos que mas lo necesitaba recibió la ayuda con la enfermedad de su hijo, este tiempo pudo aprender a administrar su dinero y de esa forma mejorar su negocio, ahora este préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de mochilas y ropas para llevar a la selva.
texts.en: Antonia‘s a member of the “Marcela” communal bank; she’s 56 years old and sells clothes and backpacks in street markets.  She’s married and the mother of three children.  She thanks Finca because in the moments when she most needed it she got help with her son’s illness.  This time she learned how to administer her money and improve her business.  Now, she’ll use this loan to buy backpacks and clothes to take to the jungle.

loans.use: to buy backpacks and clothes.

loans.name: Gloria Ester

texts.es:
Doña Gloria tiene 30 años de edad, vive en unión libre, es madre de 1 hijo y se dedica al comercio, su principal actividad es la venta de abarrotería (Pulpería), tiene más de 10 meses de haber iniciado su negocio. la Sra. Gloria ha sabido ganarse la clientela por la atención que les brinda y por los precios que ofrece.
Gloria necesita el préstamo para comprar productos de la canasta básica como ser: Arroz, Frijoles, Maíz, manteca, azúcar, jabones, carnes, productos lácteos etc. Y así ofrecerle mas variedad a sus clientes.
las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante con su hijo, desea darle una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Gloria, 30, lives in a common law relationship and is the mother of a son; she is a merchant.  Her main activity is grocery sales (Grocery Store); it’s been more than 10 months since she started her business.  Gloria has known how to win over customers with the service she provides and the prices she offers.  Gloria needs the loan to buy basic staple items like: rice, beans, corn, lard, sugar, soap, meats, dairy products, etc. to offer a wider variety to her customers.  She needs the profits to get ahead with her son; she wants to give him a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
San Cayetano es el grupo formado por 10 mujeres de la ciudad de Curuguaty, ellas son personas muy luchadoras y se esfuerzan día a día para poder dar a sus familias un mejor estilo de vida y de esa forma darles lo que ellas no pudieron tener. Actualmente están en el tercer ciclo, y una de estas mujeres es la señora Gloria, quien se dedica a la reparación de teléfonos celulares de todo tipo.
Comenta que gracias a Dios tiene muchos clientes y que gracias a ello ella puede ayudar con los gastos de la casa que diariamente surgen. Ella dice que a muchas personas le sorprende ver a una mujer reparando celulares y eso es lo que más le gusta.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de carcasas, repuestos para teléfonos y demás artículos, lo cual le será de mucha ayuda con su negocio.
texts.en:
“San Cayetano” is a group composed of ten women from the city of Curuguaty; they are very tenacious people who strive day to day to be able to give their families a better living standard and thus give them what they themselves were unable to have.  They are currently in the third cycle.  One of these women is Gloria who works repairing all types of mobile phones.

She comments that thanks to God she has many customers and thanks to this she’s able to help with household expenses that crop up every day.  She says that many people are surprised to see a woman repairing mobile phones and that’s what pleases her the most.

She requested the loan to buy cases and spare parts for mobile phones and other items which will be very helpful for her business.

loans.use: to buy mobile phone spare parts and cases.

loans.name: Orfilia De Jesus

texts.es:
A sus 56 años de edad Orfilia es una madre soltera cabeza de familia que siempre ha querido brindarle a su hijo todo lo que necesita, por esto trabaja fuertemente todos los días para generar los ingresos necesarios para su hogar. Inicialmente Orfilia comenzó produciendo detergentes para su casa, y le gustaba tanto a sus vecinos que empezó a venderlo poco a poco. Luego, Orfilia encontró otra oportunidad de negocio con las comidas rápidas, por lo que compró un carro para desempeñarse en dicha actividad. Actualmente Orfilia sigue trabajando en las comidas rápidas y sus productos tienen muy buena reputación entre sus clientes por ser de tan buena calidad. Orfilia ha visto como su negocio ha incrementado sus ventas, hasta el punto que se ha visto en la obligación de no seguir vendiendo durante el día por no disponer de los insumos necesarios para la preparación de las comidas. Es por esto que Orfilia busca un préstamo que le permita acceder a la compra de materias primas y pueda seguir abasteciendo todos los pedidos de sus clientes, y así seguir incrementando sus ingresos.
Orfilia tiene un gran sueño y es el de tener un gran restaurante que le permita generar mucho empleo para sus familiares desempleados, y así mejorar no solo su calidad de vida, sino de todas las personas que la rodean.
texts.en:
At the age of 56, Orfilia is single and a mother head of household who has always wanted to provide her son with everything he needs; this is why she works hard every day to generate the income necessary for her home.  

Initially, Orfilia started making detergent at home and her neighbors liked it so much that she gradually started to sell it all.  Then, Orfilia found another business opportunity: fast food sales.  So she bought a cart to go into this activity.  Currently, Orfilia continues with the fast-food business and her products have a very good reputation among her customers because they are of such good quality.  

Orfilia has seen how her business has increased in sales to the point where she has to stop selling during the day because she runs out of supplies needed to make the food.  This is why Orfilia is seeking a loan that will allow her to access raw materials to continue filling all her customer orders and continue increasing her income.


Orfilia has a great dream: to own a great restaurant that will allow her to generate employment for disadvantaged relatives and improve not only her quality of life but also that of everyone around her.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and supplies to prepare her food.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy nutritionally balanced feed for his pigs.

loans.name: Gicela Yaneth

texts.es: Doña Gicela tiene 36 años de edad, esta casada y se dedica al comercio, su actividad principal es la compra y venta de granos básicos, con más de 1 año de haber iniciado su negocio., la mayoría de sus clientes son los vecinos y las personas que transitan por la zona, Gicela surte a sus vecinos  y muchos la prefieren por la calidad de sus productos.  la Sra. Gicela utilizara el credito para la compra de Maíz Y frijoles, desea cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en: Gisela, 36, is married and a merchant; her main activity is buying and selling basic grains.  She’s been in business a year.  Most of her customers are neighbors and passersby in the zone.  Gisela stocks her neighbors and many prefer her because of the quality of her goods.  Gisela will use the loan to buy corn and beans because she wants to meet customer demand.

loans.use: to buy basic grains (beans and corn).

loans.name: Genesis 1, 2 &3 Group

texts.en:
Luisa is one of the members of the Genesis 1, 2 & 3. The members are micro-entrepreneurs who sell clothing, shoes, fruits, vegetables, crafts and bread. Some members also have businesses such as a beauty salon or a grocery store. The businesses are located mainly in the city of El Seybo, a farming community in the northeast of the country.

Luisa makes her home in a simple structure with her two children. She tells us that her most difficult challenge is to raise her children and educate them, even while she is working and taking income home. Her children are attending school while she is walking around in different communities selling her products. She enjoys being at her home. She sells miscellaneous products like clothes, shoes, underwear and cosmetics. This loan, her 5th, will be used to buy more of these items to sell. 

Luisa has repaid her previous four loans satisfactorily and is taking an important step towards her business’s growth. At the beginning she thought this loan could be good for capital, and now she loves the program and likes to share with all the members. She will continue using her business profits to cover her family's expenses and to reinvest in her business. She thanks all of you for your support.

In this loan, we are adding three pictures, they were taken in their community. The three pictures complete the group of 15 members.

loans.use: to buy miscellaneous products like clothes, shoes, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: Mario tiene 35 años, es un hombre muy trabajador, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Gloria de 33 años y sus 03 queridos hijos. Mario es un hombre muy trabajador, pues se dedica con mucho esmero en el cultivo de café, producto que una vez cosechado los lleva a vender a la ciudad de San Francisco, en donde ya tiene diversos compradores, que por la calidad del mismo compran al por mayor. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y hacerlas fértiles y productivas, lleva  22 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es fumigar sus chacras de la plaga de insectos, ya que tiene que hacerlo con mucho cuidado por que los productos químicos causan reacciones y teme por su salud posteriormente. En adelante, espera seguir ahorrando sus ingresos por que desea comprar nuevas tierras. Por tanto este será su crédito número 05 con MFP, sabe que éste aporte le será muy beneficioso para el desarrollo de su trabajo. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, contratará jornaleros para que lo apoyen en el mantenimiento respectivo de sus cultivos como: podar las plantas, sacar la maleza y fumigar.
texts.en:
Mario is 35 years old and a very hardworking man.  He lives in his own house with his spouse, Gloria, 33, and their three beloved children.  Mario is a very hardworking man who puts much dedication into his coffee crops; a product that once harvested is taken to be sold in the city of San Francisco where he has several buyers who buy from him at wholesale because of its quality.

What he most enjoys about his work is planting his fields and making them fertile and productive.  He’s been in this line of work for 22 years and considers the most difficult part fumigating his fields for insect infestations because he has to do it very carefully because the chemicals cause reactions and he fears for his health in the future.

He hopes to continue saving income because he wants to buy new fields.  This will be MFP loan #5.  He knows that this will be very beneficial for his work’s development.  He will use the 1000 new soles to hire day laborers who can help him with crop maintenance: pruning, weeding and fumigating.

loans.use: to hire day laborers.

loans.name: Pandilla Group

texts.es:
Pandilla es un grupo solidario de 7 mujeres muy unidas y que como su nombre lo dice se apoyan mutuamente en cualquier problema que se les ponga enfrente hasta solucionarlo y salir adelante.

Ma Ines es una de las integrantes del grupo, es una persona muy responsable y honesta que lucha día con día para salir adelante con su familia y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. Poco a poco y con mucho esfuerzo comenzando con la venta de articulos para el cabello, llego a hacerse de una estética, la cual ahora atiende con mucho gusto porque le gusta ayudar a las personas a tener una mejor apariencia, además de ayudarle a ella a cumplir con los gastos en el hogar y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la educación de sus hijos.

Ines desea que su negocio progrese y el crédito que acaba de recibir la ayudara a mejorar tanto su establecimiento, como los articulos que utiliza para realizar su actividad y de esa manera brindarle a sus clientes mas calidad y servicio.
texts.en:
Pandilla [Gang] is a supportive group of 7 very close women.  As their name says, they mutually support one another through any problem that they face until it is solved and they move forward.

Ma Ines is one of the group members.  She is a very responsible and honest person who fights day after day to move ahead with her family and give them a better quality of life.  Little by little, and with much effort, she is beginning to sell hair items.  She made herself look good, which now she is very pleased to assist others because she likes to help people have a better appearance.  In addition to helping her to pay the costs of her home, it also helps her to support her husband with the cost of her children's education. 

Ines wants her business to make progress, and the loan that she is receiving will help her to improve her establishment.  She will get articles that she will use to do her activity, and in this way offer her customers more quality and service.

loans.use: to get more aesthetic items and things to use in hair.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is a resident of Mombasa, Kenya. She is married and has one child. Lydia has been selling clothes for the last two years, a business she began from her personal savings. She learned of Milango (a Kiva partner) from her friends.

Lydia is applying for a loan of 30,000 Kenya shillings to purchase more clothes for sale. Her main challenges are finding customers and price fluctuations. She looks forward to owning a wholesale shop.

loans.use: To purchase more clothes for sale.

loans.name: San Isidro Unido Group

texts.es:
El comité  “San Isidro Unidos'', se conformó con la iniciativa de una de las miembros que oyó hablar acerca del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la fundación e inspirada en la idea de un bien para sus compañeras las invitó. Y actualmente se encuentran en el primer ciclo, están aprendiendo la importancia de trabajar en equipo dentro de un grupo con responsabilidad, honestidad y comunicación.
Graciela es una de las miembros del grupo, ella es una mujer muy sacrificada y trabajadora. Cuenta que siempre tiene mucho trabajo y pedidos, ella se dedica a la carpintería y cuenta que gracias a su trabajo ella ha podido mantener a su familia y darles lo necesario para el día a día.
Ella pide la ayuda de la fundación y de kiva para la compra de maderas, clavos y terciadas, para utilizar en su taller, ya que tiene pedidos con los que le gustaría poder cumplir.
texts.en:
The communal bank “San Isidro Unidos'' was formed at the initiative of one of the members who heard about the Fundacion's Enterprising Women Program.  She was inspired by the idea that this would be good for her friends, and so she invited them to join.  Now this group is in its first loan cycle, and they are learning the importance of working as a team, within a group that is responsible, honest and communicative.

Graciela is one of the members of this group; she is a very hardworking and self-sacrificing woman.  She tells us that she always has a lot of work and orders.  She is a carpenter and thanks to her work, she has been able to support her family and provide for their daily needs.

Graciela requests the help of the Fundacion and Kiva so that she can buy wood, nails and plywood to use in her workshop, since she has orders that she would like to be able to fill.

loans.use: to buy wood, plywood, nails and other supplies

loans.name: Alegria Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Alegría” está conformado por 16 emprendedoras, quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran venta de ropa de casa (sábanas y cortinas), venta de joyas, lencería, juguetería y frutas. Todas ellas pertenecientes a la Provincia de Osorno.
Jacqueline integrante y presidenta del grupo del Banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra en cuclillas en la primera fila, ubicada en el primer lugar de derecha a izquierda. Ella usa su cabello tomado, viste un polerón color claro y además sostiene a su pequeña hija en sus brazos.
Jacqueline es chef de comida internacional y se dedica a preparar comida gourmet (platos de comida refinados), desde hace 7 años. Sus comidas preparadas las vende a domicilio por pedido, promociona sus servicios de boca en boca y con tarjetas de presentación. Comenta que lo primordial en sus preparaciones es la presentación de los platos, ya que todo “entra por la vista”.
Prepara las comidas en la cocina de su casa, para esto debió ampliarla. Ahí cuenta con diferentes maquinarias y electrodomésticos para trabajar.
Con el crédito comprará insumos para su negocio.
Una de las metas en su negocio es comprarse un vehículo para trasladar su mercadería y también contar con un local independiente a su casa, para tener una mayor comodidad. 
Jacqueline vive junto a su marido y sus dos hijos de 8 y 2 años de edad. Sus sueños a nivel personal son reconocimiento en su negocio y que este le brinde mayores utilidades. Ya que con esto podría brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. 
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad que le ha brindado Fondo Esperanza, ya que le permitirá invertir en su negocio.
Comenta que el grupo del Banco comunal del cual forma parte es responsable.
Osorno es una ciudad que se ubica en la zona sur de Chile, región de Los Lagos. Es un importante centro agropecuario que se identifica como "La Patria de la Leche y Tierra de la Carne" de Chile. Dentro de su actividad agropecuaria se destaca el cultivo de trigo y avena, la crianza de ganado, para el procesamiento de carnes y lácteos además de la fabricación de equipos agrarios.
Destaca en Osorno el único estadio de fútbol techado de Chile, el Estadio Municipal "Rubén Marcos”.
texts.en:
This community bank is called 'Alegría' (Happiness).  It has 16 female members.  The women are all entrepreneurs and all work in different fields, including selling soft furnishings (sheets and drapes), selling jewelry, underwear, toys and fruit.  All of the women live in Osorno province.

Jacqueline is a member of this community bank.  She is also its president.  In the photo, she is crouching down in the front row.  She is on the far right of the photo.  Her hair is tied back and she is wearing a light-colored hooded top.  She is holding her young daughter in her arms.  

Jacqueline is a chef who makes international food.  She has been making gourmet meals for 7 years.  She sells her prepared meals to order, by home delivery.  She promotes her services by word of mouth and with business cards.  She says that the most important thing in preparing her meals is presenting the dishes well as everything "enters through the eyes".  She prepares the meals in the kitchen in her house, which she had to extend for this purpose.  There she has different machines and appliances which she works with.

Jacqueline will use her loan to buy supplies for her business.  One of her goals for her business is to buy a vehicle so that she can transport her merchandise.  She would also like to have business premises which are separate from her house, so that she can work more comfortably.  Jacqueline lives with her husband and her two children who are 8 and 2 years old.  Her dreams, on a personal level, are to become well known in her business and for her business to make her more profit so that she can provide her family with a better quality of life.

Jacqueline is happy and grateful for the opportunity that Fondo Esperanza have given her as it will allow her to invest in her business.  She says that her community bank is responsible.  

Osorno is a city which is located in the southern part of Chile, in Los Lagos region.  It is an important agricultural center which is known as Chile's 'homeland of milk and meat'.  Chief among its farming activities is the production of wheat and oats, cattle raising (both for meat and milk) and the manufacture of farming equipment.  Osorno is home to the only soccer stadium in Chile to have a roof: the 'Rubén Marcos' Municipal Stadium.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her business

loans.name: Naftaly

texts.en:
Naftaly owns a mobile money transfer shop; the business has been in operation for one year. He is married and resides in Mombasa, Kenya. He heard about Milango from his friends.

Naftaly began the business from his savings. He is now applying for a loan of 40,000 Kenya shillings to increase the till amount/float. The challenge comes from the competition; there are other shops dealing in the same business in the area.

Naftaly will purchase refreshments from the additional income since some customers request these during the transactions.

loans.use: To increase the till amount/float for his mobile money transfer business.

loans.name: Divina Misericordia - El  Tambo Group

texts.es:
La señora BERTHA de 54 años de edad de estado civil casada, tiene 04 hijos menores de edad. Es socias de la  alcancía comunal “Divina Misericordia - El Tambo”.
Actualmente tiene una Tienda de Distribuidoras de Extintores que atiende conjuntamente con su esposo y  la vez  Vende de Productos Medicinales Naturales que ofrece de vivienda en vivienda. El préstamo solicito para invertir en la remodelación e implementación de la tienda de Ventas de Extintores, dándose la oportunidad para mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
Desea en el futuro comprar su auto para el servicio de traslado de su mercaderías, ella está ubicada la tercera persona lado izquierda sentada en una silla viste con una un chompa color crema puesta con un lentes.
texts.en:
Bertha, age 54, is married and has four minor children.  She is a member of the Divina Misericordia – El Tambo communal bank.

She currently has a store distributing fire extinguishers.  She and her husband tend to the store together.  At the same time she sells natural medicinal products door to door.

The requested loan is for the remodeling and implementation of the store selling fire extinguishers.  This gives her the opportunity to improve her income.

In the future she hopes to buy a car for transporting her merchandise.  

In the photo she is the third person on the left side in a chair.  She is wearing a cream colored sweater, and she is wearing glasses.

loans.use: to buy fire extinguishers.

loans.name: Khamisi

texts.en:
Khamisi is a resident of Mombasa, Kenya. He is married and has two children. Khamisi owns a cosmetics shop. He learnt of Milango from his friends and is applying for a loan of 40,000 Kenya shillings to construct more shelves and purchase additional stock of cosmetics.

Khamisi looks forward to opening more shops at different locations in the country despite the challenges of price fluctuations and inflation.

loans.use: To construct more shelves and purchase additional stock of cosmetics.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es: Olga de 23 años, es una joven soltera alegre y trabajadora con ganas de triunfar en la vida, vive en su propia casa y lo que más desea es obtener mejores ingresos para así darle una buena estabilidad económica a su futura familia. La actividad a la que se dedica Olga, es al cultivo de cacao; pues tanto la planta y las tierras fue herencia de sus padres, desde entonces trabajan labrando y sembrando. Asimismo necesita del apoyo de los jornaleros, para que puedan sacar la maleza de entre sus plantas, así como cosechar y trasladar los productos  hasta las carreteras, que luego serán llevados con triciclos y/o carretillas. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es la libertad que tiene en el desempeño de su labor, ya que ella decide que es lo mejor para sus cultivos, lleva 15 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es combatir con la plaga que se apoderan de los brotes de sus cultivos.  Ahora lo que más prioriza es comprar nuevas tierras para amplair la siembra, por tanto este será su crédito número 03 con MFP, es conciente que éste aporte le será muy útil en el progreso de su trabajo. Se siente muy contenta por ser socia de su banco comunal y aportará de si misma por el desarrollo de su grupo. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará semillas de cacao para incrementar su producción.
texts.en:
23-year-old Olga is a young, single woman.  She is cheerful and hard-working, and has a desire to do well in life.  She lives in her own home and what she most wants is to make better income so that she can provide good financial stability to her future family.  Olga's business is growing cacao.  The plants and the land were an inheritance from her parents.  She works the soil and sows her seeds.  She also needs the support of laborers to weed between her plants, harvest them and transport them to the roads where they will then be taken off by three-wheeled vehicles and / or wheelbarrows.  What Olga most enjoys about her work is the freedom that she has to carry out her tasks as she decides what is best for her crops.  She has been in this business for 15 years and she considers the most difficult part of her work to be battling the pests who attack her plants' shoots.  Her biggest priority right now is to buy more land so that she can grow more crops.  

This will be Olga's third loan through MFP.  She is aware that it will be very useful to her in making progress in her work.  She feels very happy to be a member of her community bank and she will contribute towards the development of her group.  Olga will use the 2,000 soles to buy cacao seeds with which to increase her production.

loans.use: to buy cacao seeds

loans.name: Nelson

texts.es:
El Sr. Nelson es de la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, tiene 40 años de edad, está acompañado con la Sra. María hace 12 años, juntos tienen 2 hijos, Laura de 9 y Rodrigo de 7 años.
El Sr. Nelson es letrista, y nos cuenta que tiene su negocio tiene en la casa de su madre sobre la avenida principal de la ciudad, Comenzó la profesión de letrista muy joven, antes era empleado hasta que se decidió a montar su propio taller de letras y creatividad, comenta que en principio le costó un poco por la falta de capital y crear su propia clientela, con el tiempo empezaron a conocerlo por sus trabajos que fueron aceptados y valorados con lo su negocio fue creciendo y hoy en día ya es un gran microempresario. Nelson nos cuenta que todo su trabajo es por sus hijos, ya que quiere que ellos el día de mañana sean personas con buenas profesiones que trabajen bien y no tengan de que preocuparse.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de pinturas, lonas, lienzo y de más insumos necesarios para hacer sus carteles. Agradece a la fundación y a kiva por la oportunidad que le están dando.
texts.en:
Nelson, 40, is from Coronel Oviedo, has been married to Maria for 12 years and they have 2 children: Laura, 9 and Rodrigo, 7.
Nelson is a printer and he tells us that his business is located in his mother’s house on the main street of the city.  He began his career when he was very young.  First he worked as an employee until he decided to open his own print and design shop.  He tells us that at the beginning it was difficult because of the lack of capital and having to develop his own customer base.  But with time he became known for his work that was appreciated and accepted and his business was growing.
